synopsis.text: Kotenco is a young prince who guards the Angel Star, a treasured artifact, for the Queen in the heavenly paradise land known as Paradice. Kotenco is usually a kind and obedient child, but when evil spirits arise, he transforms into his mischievous alter-ego Matenco. As Matenco, Kotenco causes trouble for the people around him. Luckily, by changing his angel ring, Matenco can revert back to the good-natured Kotenco. Trouble is brewing as the villainous ruler of the underground Land of the Grounds aims to invade Paradice and steal the powerful Angel Star. With the help of the Queen and his trusty angel ring, Kotenco/Matenco must protect both the Angel Star and the people of Paradice from the invading forces. It's a big task for a little prince, but Kotenco is determined to guard what he holds dear. This lighthearted anime aimed at young viewers follows the comedic adventures of Kotenco/Matenco as he taps into both sides of himself to take on threats from mischievous spirits to the Devil himself. With high stakes and silly hijinks, viewers are sure to be delighted and entertained.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
